line.token: * Icon to use for this page type.
"Are you sure you want to remove this item? Pop-up double-check question..."
"Are you sure you want to retrieve your saved list? Pop-up double-check question... We ask them because they will loose their currently shown list."
"Are you sure you want to clear your saved list? Pop-up double-check question..."
"are you sure you want to remove it from your wish list?"
"Are you sure you would like to retrieve your saved list? It will replace your current list. Do you want to go ahead?"
"Are you sure you would like to clear your saved list? "
"could not be removed from wish list"
* Initialisation function that is run before any action on the controller is called.
* Return whether there are wish list items to be saved.
* Return whether there are wish list items to be retrieved (that haven't already been retrieved).
* Return whether the member wish list is non-empty and hence can be cleared.
